item.title: Kristen Stewart on Her Favorite French Films, From Catherine Breillat to Leos Carax and Michael Haneke
item.description: Kristen Stewart drew a packed house of festivalgoers, locals and fans at France’s Deauville Film Festival for her masterclass titled My French Cinema and organized with Chanel. For the occasion,

item.title: Kristen Stewart’s Directorial Debut ‘The Chronology of Water’ to Close Oldenburg
item.description: Stewart’s first feature as a director premiered in Un Certain Regard in Cannes and was picked up for North America by The Forge.
